A refreshingly simple take on the news reader experience.

Client / Company

Mokko

Role

Product Designer, Project Manager, App Developer

Project Link

News Deck was built in under a week with a free API (NewsAPI.org) to bring you the top news feeds from around the world - and you can use simple, intuitive gestures to read exactly what you are interested in.
